mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( rsm_id, itm_form_id, itm_title, itm_content, u_id, itm_reg_dt, itm_seq, itm_use_yn ) VALUES ( #{rsm_id}, ITEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{itm_title}, #{itm_content}, #{u_id}, sysdate, #{itm_seq}, 1 )

INSERT INTO item ( rsm_id, itm_form_id, itm_prd_id, itm_title, itm_content, u_id, itm_reg_dt, itm_seq, itm_use_yn ) VALUES ( #{rsm_id}, ITEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{itm_prd_id}, #{itm_title}, #{itm_content}, #{u_id}, sysdate, #{itm_seq}, 1 )
mapper.update: MERGE INTO item i USING DUAL ON (i.itm_form_id = #{itm_form_id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET i.itm_title = #{itm_title}, i.itm_content = #{itm_content}, i.itm_seq = #{itm_seq}, i.itm_use_yn = 1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (i.rsm_id, i.itm_form_id, i.itm_title, i.itm_content, i.u_id, i.itm_reg_dt, i.itm_seq, i.itm_use_yn) VALUES (#{rsm_id}, ITEM_SEQ.nextval, #{itm_title}, #{itm_content}, #{u_id}, sysdate, #{itm_seq}, 1 )
update item set itm_use_yn = 0 where rsm_id = #{rsm_id} and itm_prd_id is null
mapper.select: SELECT a1.*, b1.totalNo FROM (SELECT i.rsm_id, i.itm_form_id, i.itm_prd_id, i.itm_title, i.itm_content, i.u_id, u.u_name, i.itm_reg_dt, i.itm_seq, i.itm_use_yn, LEVEL AS lvl, ROWNUM AS NO FROM item i, users u WHERE rsm_id = #{rsm_id} AND i.u_id = u.u_id AND itm_use_yn = 1 START WITH itm_prd_id IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR itm_form_id = itm_prd_id ORDER SIBLINGS BY ITM_SEQ) a1, (SELECT * FROM (SELECT root, COUNT(itm_form_id) OVER(PARTITION BY root ORDER BY lvl DESC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING) AS totalNo, itm_prd_id, itm_form_id FROM ( SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT ( itm_form_id ) root, itm_prd_id, itm_form_id, LEVEL AS lvl FROM item WHERE rsm_id = #{rsm_id} CONNECT BY itm_prd_id = PRIOR itm_form_id ) WHERE lvl BETWEEN 1 AND 2 ) WHERE itm_form_id = root) b1 WHERE a1.itm_form_id = b1.itm_form_id ORDER BY a1.NO
